attributes.action: Provide care home costs funding for alll UK citizens,not just those that live in Scotland.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: End the unjust situation where non Scottish residents are forced to sell their homes and lose most of their savings,if any,to fund residential home care costs.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
